name: Cathy's Garden
description:
We highly recommend the downloadable version of this game as it contains an additional cutscene.

Catherine Clark, botanical expert and avid gardening enthusiast, loves spending her time in her garden. There is nothing more satisfying than growing luminous sunflowers, all while surrounded by nature. The song of the birds, the tickle of the grass, and the curious sniffing of the many bunnies. 

Use WASD / Arrow-keys to move around and a mouse to aim.

Team Hedgelizards:

  • Jelke Ludolphij - Art
  • Jessica Sies - Narrative and UI
  • Julian Vos - Programming
  • Michiel de Jong - Programming
  • Milan Raphaël - Music and SFX

Special thanks to Lydwe van Westen & Marina Roest.
